## NFTDrop.get() method

Get the metadata for a specific NFT

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(mintAddress: string): Promise<NFTMetadata>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mintAddress | string | the mint address of the NFT to get |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[NFTMetadata](./solana.nftmetadata.md)<!-- -->&gt;

the metadata of the NFT

## Example


```jsx
const mintAddress = "...";
const nft = await program.get(mintAddress);
```
